entry.title: Your Blog Post Title Here
entry.content:
Your Content Starts Here

Write your blog post content using Markdown. You can use:

  • Bold text with **text**
  • Italic text with *text*
  • Links
  • inline code
  • And much more!

Code Blocks

def hello_world():
    print("Hello, World!")

Math Equations

Inline math: \(E = mc^2\)

Display math: \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = X\)

Images

Include images with the figure helper:

Remember:

  • File must be named: YYYY-MM-DD-your-post-title.md
  • Place in _posts/ directory
  • The lang field determines which language version of the site will show this post
entry.summary: A brief, compelling description of your post (shown in blog listing)

entry.title: My First Blog Post
entry.content:
Introduction

Welcome to my blog! In this post, I’ll be sharing insights about my work in energy optimization and data science.

What I’m Working On

I’m currently focused on several exciting projects:

  • Electricity Production Planning using MILP optimization
  • Portfolio Decarbonization for sustainable investing
  • Energy Transport Analysis (TranspoZé)

Key Takeaways

Stay tuned for more detailed posts about each of these projects, including:

  • Methodological approaches
  • Key results and findings
  • Lessons learned

More updates coming soon!
entry.summary: This is my first blog post explaining my projects and thoughts
